name: Ghost Rider Game
description:
Put your motorbike driving skills to the test with this awesome bike of Bike Race X game. Reach the finish line as fast as possible without crashing and blowing up you bike and keep unlocking new more challenging stages. Master the tracks to get 3 stars in every level and buy new better bikes. Have fun!

Play Now Jump on your motorcycle as you attempt to safely race up and down the hills, jump through gaps and avoid any deadly obstacles. Safely get to the checkered flag as quickly as possible to pass each level. There are 30 different levels for you to master as you try to complete your racing trials!

So don't waste any more time and grab a bike, strap on your helmet, surmount obstacles and beat the time on amazing off-road circuits. You are in charge to guide the brave motorcyclist through 30 challenging levels and help him overcome all the massive and moving obstacles on the way. In Bike Race X you also have to tune the speed of the motorcycle and also find a perfect balance, trying not to kill the driver, otherwise the game will be over.

Features:
- Single and multiplayer modes
- Earn stars to unlock new levels
- Dozen addictive worlds
- Hundreds of challenging tracks
- Simple controls
